scripts.test: if ! pgrep -a -f -x 'node ./examples/server.js'  && ! pgrep -a -f -x 'node ./tests/server.js 8080'; then node ./examples/server.js; fi & export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider; cypress run --record --key 70a72be1-45d1-487f-8c76-9b7df228e0e6 && { pkill -e -f -x 'node ./examples/server.js'; echo 'ok'; exit 0; } || { pkill -e -f -x 'node ./examples/server.js'; echo 'not ok'; exit 1; }
scripts.test:dev: if ! pgrep -a -f -x 'node ./examples/server.js'  && ! pgrep -a -f -x 'node ./tests/server.js 8080'; then node ./examples/server.js; fi & export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider; cypress run --config video=false --browser chrome --headed && { pkill -e -f -x 'node ./examples/server.js'; echo 'ok'; exit 0; } || { pkill -e -f -x 'node ./examples/server.js'; echo 'not ok'; exit 1; }
scripts.test:browsers: if ! pgrep -a -f -x 'node ./examples/server.js'  && ! pgrep -a -f -x 'node ./tests/server.js 8080'; then node ./examples/server.js; fi & export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider; cypress run --browser chrome && cypress run --browser firefox && { pkill -e -f -x 'node ./examples/server.js'; echo 'ok'; exit 0; } || { pkill -e -f -x 'node ./examples/server.js'; echo 'not ok'; exit 1; }
scripts.test:repeat: if ! pgrep -a -f -x 'node ./examples/server.js'  && ! pgrep -a -f -x 'node ./tests/server.js 8080'; then node ./examples/server.js; fi & export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider; npx cypress-repeat run -n 6 && { pkill -e -f -x 'node ./examples/server.js'; echo 'ok'; exit 0; } || { pkill -e -f -x 'node ./examples/server.js'; echo 'not ok'; exit 1; }

author: NEURONET - Rafal Pospiech <neuronet.io@gmail.com>
